comments.content:
Hope someone recognizes this wonky font.  
If they don't you could substitute Black Cherry Moon BT or something similar:  
 [http://www.identifont.com/show?I3W](http://web.archive.org/web/20140410081202/http:/www.identifont.com/show?I3W "http://www.identifont.com/show?I3W")  
Don
It looks like **PFSugar Bold** by Panos Vassiliou (1993-2002 Parachute Fonts) but I can't find a legitimate source for it.

its pfsugar yes!! :)  
thank you so much
